title: Stage Lv6-P2-S13
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: It is said that the company will merge with another firm.
He is known to be an expert in this field.
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 회사가 다른 회사와 합병할 것이라고 전해집니다.
sentences.en: It is said that the company will merge with another firm.

sentences.kr: 그는 이 분야의 전문가로 알려져 있습니다.
sentences.en: He is known to be an expert in this field.
The meeting is supposed to start at 3 PM.
This technology is considered to be revolutionary.

sentences.kr: 그 소식이 곧 발표될 예정이라고 믿어집니다.
sentences.en: It is believed that the news will be announced soon.

sentences.kr: 그는 그 일을 완료했다고 여겨지지 않습니다.
sentences.en: He is not thought to have completed the task.

sentences.kr: 새로운 규정이 내년에 도입될 것으로 예상됩니다.
sentences.en: New regulations are expected to be introduced next year.

sentences.kr: 이 제품이 시장에서 성공할 것으로 보입니다.
sentences.en: This product is seen to succeed in the market.
